actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to allow a person having a claim for damages against an individual entitled to diplomatic immunity to bring an action in the Court of Claims for recovery of such damages from the United States.

summary.text: Makes the United States liable, through actions in the Court of Claims, for damages caused by persons entitled to diplomatic immunity if the claimant has no other recourse due to such immunity.

titles.title: A bill to allow a person having a claim for damages against an individual entitled to diplomatic immunity to bring an action in the Court of Claims for recovery of such damages from the United States.
